I've been finding success in this build:

Summoner Spells: Clarity + Flash

Runes: MPen Reds (x9)  Scaling Armor Yellows (x9) Scaling CD Blues (x9) Scaling CD Quints (x3)

Masteries: 21/9/0 (5% cd)

Build Order: Flask 3Red --> Tear --> RoA --> Mobility Boots + Homeguards --> Seraphs --> RoA (x3) OR RoA(x2) + Void Staff

Reasoning: Kassadin's ulti has been nerfed time and time again. With the recent addition of AP scaling to his ulti, however, Kassadin got some of his damage back. 

Normally, you wouldn't be able to stack up your ulti before blinking onto your target due to running out of mana, or dying too fast if you tried. With this build, you can have 5k+ mana for 10+ blinks (That's over 5000 range wherever you want to go!), and 4k+ health with Seraph Shield so you can go crazy. Clarity gives you an extra 1-3 blinks if you run out of mana.

For those of you who think this is a troll "Tank Kassadin" build, remember that these are all AP items, albeit all geared towards the late game. Then again, Kassadin has always been an amazing late game champion. 

Survive the early-mid game, and this build will create a late game monster with 1.35s cd blink, burst comparable to Katarina, consistent AoE damage  from ulti, and the ability to catch a target from halfway across the map.

Disclaimer: Only had ~10 games with this build in normals. Always like to test new builds extensively before bringing into ranked.
